DOC.detailed_description: This Open Pilot Study ass whether Duloxetine effective patient Atypical Features . 20 patient Major Depressive Disorder Atypical Features Dysthymic Disorder receive Duloxetine open fashion 8 week . Dose begin 20 mg/d increase PDR maximal dose 120 mg/d , tolerate .
